answers.answer: Nancy,Don't apologize about a "long" post. Talking to each other is why we are all here. length isn't an issue as long as it is divided into short paragraphs for those of us with vision problems.It sounds like your neuro is on top of things Waiting IS the worst. Hang in there!! And don't forget you are always welcome to come and vent or share your thoughts.Ren

Neuro said not to worry - we'll figure out what's wrong. How wonderful is this!I'm glad you are in good hands.You didn't type long at all. Don't worry about that either!  Be good to yourself and we'll help!(((hugs)))-shell
sounds great that your neuro. is dedicated to persuing your case for an answer!!!keep us posted!xo michelle
Thanks for your posts & words of encouragement. Made it thru the MRI without panicking. I feel real tired today. At work & have a lot to do! Have a great day!Nancy

Nancy,I hope that you are able to get some rest this weekend to recover.I love the fact that you posted from work and had lots to do! I do that some days also and swear that i couldn't make it through the work day without popping in to the forum :)Your doctor sounds fantastic. Of course you will worry some - it can't be helped but you must feel good hearing her say that she will figure out what's wrong. She sounds like a keeper!Get some rest and keep us postedHugs,Erin :)

I was surprised at how I felt today when I woke up. I increased the Lyrica to two pills last night & wasn't hurting when I got up. I did yard work which did hurt but paced myself. My arms are aching now. Overall a good day. I hope you all had one too!Nancy

question: The neuro visit went well. She had a nerve test done which felt like shocks in my legs & feet & then she did a test with needles. I have neuroapthy & donated bunches of blood for tests to see how B-12 levels, diabetes, Lupus & other things come out. Another MRI in the morning to compare to one three years ago. I feel tired today & took the B-12 shot yesterday! My neuro told me to try & not worry & that we will figure out what's wrong. I'm trying but still can't help but wonder & worry. Sorry so long a post. Talking to you all has helped me too! Thanks!!!Nancy
title: Update on Neuro Visit Today
